name: Terran Magen
languages: understands Common plus two other languages but can't speak

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the magen dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magen has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magen makes two attacks, using Hammer Fist or Thunderous Boom in any combination.

action.name: Hammer Fist
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The magen casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
